Text:
BTW, when installing, there are some problems with the last soundtracks. Just Ignore theese. If problems should arize ingame, just replace all the songs with something you like :-P
cheers.
hmm cant get it to work...no crack file

The crack is in the torrent.
When installing, just ignore the errors. Then apply the patch, and then apply the crack.
If it still doesn't work, delete the songs from 15 to 23 and the main theme in the songs directory and replace them with one of the other songs. I prefer song 13 "Steaming". Hehe.

GL

Thanks, I hsve never heard about this game before but it is the best game in this category that I have ever playe!

Similar games is: Sid Meiers railroads and the Railroad Tycoon games if you wants trains

And Transport Tycoon or Truck Tycoon if you wants car / trucks to play with!
I cannot find the crack file. Can you please tell where it is in the downloaded torrent?
wat is an ISO file nd how to unzip it?
please seed

ok everyone listen up.

the crack is the long zip file in this torrent. read the nfo file when u extract the long zip file.

an iso is a cd image used by other programs like demon tools. and other burning or virtual drive programs,

if u want to extract the contents,  i would suggest getting magic iso, but if u have a virtual program already installed, mount the image onto the program and install that way...

and also ignore any errors as the uploader has already said about..

please everyone read readmes if theres any.
regards
darkdaz

lol I just found how to change game speed, it's ctrl-F but I still looking for a game manual ;)
I mounted image installed game installed patch and crack and it still keeps asking for cd help

Just finished deleting this game and running several various virus and anti-malware tools. Thought I'd post this before restarting my comp... 
AUTORUN.EXE, AUTOSTART.EXE, TTT_DX.dll, and TTT_GL.dll are infected with trojans and were quarantined as soon as i mounted the .ISO image, and the TTT Menu.EXE launched some sort of malware.

Great Job... 0/10

I d/l copy games all the time and this one had me stumped, cr rom error message, then I read down, you need to go to my computer and double click the mounted image to start the game, or I presume if you burnt it to disc, insert the cd
